thread.section_title: CANDY CLUB Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CANDY CLUB | candyclub.com
thread.title: Brittany

author: Brittany
title: Brittany
text: I love Candy Club. If you buy candy often, especially gourmet candies, you will see Candy Club's prices are extremely fair. I've always received fresh candy with a fast arrival. Their cotton candy taffy is my favorite, and I love getting it scattered all around the containers inside. I've always received my box on a day when I most needed it..it always brings a smile to my face and it's perfect for sharing. Their customer service is 11 out of 10, and that's the one thing that I think could possibly be sweeter than than the candy. Love it!
